author: Lexhoya
title: These wheel are made for rolling...
review:
What can you tell about wheels and rims? Not much, but I must say there are enough pieces to make cars move, use them for other things like I needed the rims for (as casters): a crane. So actually the rubber is not used then, but only the plastic rims.

Pros

  • Enough parts to make one huge truck, or even two or three
    Also the axle parts can come in handy

Cons

  • On itself you can very little with this set, but I think that's not what it supposed to do in the first place; use it with other sets to extend the possibilities

Conclusion: nice set, multiple colored wheels (rims) in various sizes. Useful for Lego City (for small cars to 'bigwheels') and Technic (for various uses).
